resources.string:
The application has been updated to version 5.3

This version adds support for multiple storages (so far only one can be loaded at a time)
Your storage settings have been automatically moved to the "Default storage"
Multiple storage is available in the Pro version
This node cannot be encrypted because it is selected for quick insertion in settings
To complete the update, you need to launch from the main application window
Storage must not have load errors
First you need to grant write permission and select/create storage
All storage nodes must be loaded
To view data you need to load the storage…
Select an existing storage directory in the phone memory
Not available when loading only favorites
Not available when saving password locally
Select the folder containing files database.ini, mytetra.xml and subfolder base/
Insert into a new record; Create a new record and add the transferred text
Insert into a new record; Create a new record and add the transferred image (s) to its text
Attach to a new record; Create a new record and attach the transferred image (s) as file (s)
Paste into existing record; Select existing record and add transferred text
Insert into an existing entry; Select an existing entry and add the transferred image (s) to its text
Attach to an existing entry; Select an existing entry and attach the transferred image (s) as file (s)
The password will be used to encrypt selected nodes with records.
Attention! When saving, re-encryption of all encrypted data to the new password will begin.
Select an empty directory in the phone\'s memory to create a new storage

In the application the boot mode is load only favorites. To receive %s, you need to load all nodes of the storage.
Proceed?
Load last used storage (if no default storage is specified)
Save password hash locally \n(used as default value for new storages)
Set the current branch selected last time \n(used as default value for new storages)
Set the current branch selected last time
Displayed field entries in the list
Enable highlight entries with attached files
%s (used if no password hash is stored for the storage)
When to ask for a password? (used if no password hash is stored for the storage)
Path containing database.ini, mytetra.xml and base/
Common trash catalog path for all storages
Format string for created date/time display
Path to catalog with log file
Show confirmation dialog for application exit
The mechanism for transmitting a synchronization start command to the third-party application \n(used as default value for new storages)
The mechanism for transmitting a synchronization start command to the third-party application
Start synchronization before loading storage \n(used as default value for new storages)
Start synchronization before exit from app \n(used as default value for new storages)
Start synchronization before exit from app
A synchronization command or script, depends on a third-party application\nMacro% a - storage directory \n(used as default value for new storages)
A synchronization command for MGit, for example: \"git pull\"\n(used as default value for new storages)
A command or script for Termux, for example: \"git pull\" или \"~/sync.sh\". Macro% a - storage directory \n(used as default value for new storages)
Parameters Extras for Autosync, for example: \"{secret: ue43ka9x}, {folderPairs: Test folder, Screenshots, DCIM}\" \n(used as default value for new storages)
A synchronization command or script, depends on a third-party application
A synchronization command for MGit, for example: \"git pull\"
A command or script for Termux, for example: \"git pull\" или \"~/sync.sh\". Macro% a - storage directory
Parameters Extras for Autosync, for example: \"{secret: ue43ka9x}, {folderPairs: Test folder, Screenshots, DCIM}\"
Save record changes automatically when editing is completed
Do not turn off the screen when record is open
Show confirmation of synchronization start \n(used as default value for new storages)
Show confirmation of synchronization start before exit from app \n(used as default value for new storages)
Show confirmation of synchronization start before exit from app
The logs of the current startup session or the contents of the log file
Delete contents of trash folder from all storages
Delete query input hints and global search options
Open recordings immediately in edit mode, not view
Decrypt attachments to a trash directory when opening \n(used as default value for new storages)
Decrypt attachments to a trash directory when opening
Change password and re-encrypt encrypted nodes
To speed up the startup, first load only favorite entries \n(used as default value for new storages)
To speed up the startup, first load only favorite entries
Check records tree for changes by third-party programs \n(used as default value for new storages)
Check records tree for changes by third-party programs
If the storage password is saved, prompt for a PIN to access encrypted data
Correct html-text of a note for correct display in MyTetra
Whether to open the panel with record properties when opening a record
Size of buttons in bottom toolbar in text editor
Record fields to show in list
Application used to start sync \n(used as default value for new storages)
Expanding an empty nodes instead of opening a list of its records
Show the nodes tree when clicking on the Back button, instead of app exit
Show nodes when clicking on the Back
Enable/disable fullscreen mode when double tap on a record text
The default node for records created using the widget or when sending data from third-party apps. Available if this is the default storage
Available if this is the default storage
(used as default value for new storages)
(used as default value for new storages)
The storage cannot be changed from within the app (not implemented yet)
Filter records in node [%1$s] by query "%2$s"
Filter records in tag records [%1$s] by query "%2$s"
Filter files in record [%1$s] by query "%2$s"
Search text in record [%1$s] by query "%2$s"
Select not an empty tag or use the global search.
Select not an empty branch or use the global search.
No records found for query \"%1$s\" in node [%2$s]…
No records found for query \"%1$s\" in tag [%2$s]…
No matches found for query \"%1$s\" in node \"%2$s\"…
File is missing on the disk. Delete anyway ?
File is missing on the disk. Delete file from storage ?
Record directory is missing. Delete record from storage ?
No default storage is specified. Go to the list of storages ?
Node «%s» is used for quick insertion. Delete anyway?
Permission to read to external memory is required to work with storage files. Provide ?
Permission to write to external memory is required to work with storage files. Provide ?
Permission required to turn on the camera to capture an image. Provide ?
Permission required to record audio to enable voice input. Provide ?
Show logs of the current application session that could not write to the log file ?
Clear trash folder from all storages?
Start storage sync again or exit?
To do this, need to load all nodes. Proceed?
Reload storage from device file system?
Storage path was changed. Reload database?
A new repository will be created in the selected directory. Continue?
There are no encrypted nodes left. Clear encrypted password?
The record tree has been modified by a third party program. Reboot the storage to continue working with the new data outside?
The mytetra.xml file with the record tree has been removed by a third party program. Recreate a file from a tree of records loaded earlier?
The selected directory is not empty. Continue anyway?
The storage is not loaded. Load?
You need to load all nodes of the storage. Load?
Remove storage «%s» from the list and clear his trash?
Remove storage from the list and clear his trash anyway?
The \"Decrypt files to directory\" option is disabled.\nEnable the option and open the file?
Path to the log file is not specified
Error getting mytetra.xml last modified date: %s
Error getting record last modified date: %s
The record tree has been modified by a third party program
Not enough permissions to access the external file storage
Not enough permissions to run Termux commands
Not enough permissions to write into the external file storage
Missing password check information (field %s is empty in database.ini). Continue anyway with this password?
Wrong saved pass (value does not match middle_hash_check_data)
Default storage «%s» was loaded and decrypted
Current node is not selected.\nOnly search in the entire database or another node is possible
The settings specified an incorrect date/time format for creating a record. The default format will be used.
No suitable application was found to open the file: %s
No suitable application was found to share the text
Failed to read file in path:\n%s
Failed to rename file from [%s] to [%s]
Encrypted nodes were found. To search for them, enter the password.
File manager not found. Path to folder was copied to clipboard.
Error generating the path to the record folder:
Error generating the path to the attached file:
Was copied the record folder to [%s]
Denied read access to the file: %s
Default storage is not specified, load the last used one
Editing encrypted records is not implemented yet..
Error creating new file by path:\n%s
The record does not have a node
Not found record with id=[%s] in node records
Cancel %1$s %2$s, as failed to save mytetra.xml
Record deleting error: directory is absent
Unable to get current list item
The node was deleted, but an error occurred while updating the list. Reboot storage
The node was moved, but an error occurred while updating the list. Reboot storage
The node was created, but an error occurred while updating the list. Reboot storage
Failed to recognize the storage object by link
Unable to attach the file to the record
The record does not have attached files
Attached file not found in the record
No recording file will be created when saving
Start reading a file of record id=%s
Start saving a file of record id=
Start opening an attach file id=
Start opening a record folder id=
Unable to create directory to save log:
Start saving image [%1$s] to record id=%2$s
Failed to load image from file:\n%s
Failed to save image to file:\n%s
Failed to decrypt the record file
Record was deleted, but an error occurred while moving the directory to the trash
Start decrypting the text of the record
Cannot delete a single root node
Failed to read logs from memory
Folder for new storage is missing:\n%s
The node contains encrypted data. Enter password first
Empty nodes structure when saving mytetra.xml
Application settings were copied from the Free version
Permission granted to use the camera
Permission granted to write to the device’s external storage
Permission granted to run Termux commands
The functionality is disabled due to restrictions on its development
TetroidReview.showInAppReview(): request for review flow is not successful
All nodes of storage must be loaded
Folder for new storage is not empty: %s
Track changes to a file mytetra.xml was %s
An error occurred while trying to sync storage
There are no catalogs with icons
Failed to create storage files in path:\n%s
Storage with id=%s not found in database
Storage «%s» was deleted by path [%s], deleted with files=%b
Launching PIN re-encryption from RC5 to MD5
PIN has been re-encrypted from RC5 to MD5
Error re-encrypting PIN from RC5 to MD5
The mytetra.xml file with the record tree has been modified by a third party program
The mytetra.xml file with the record tree has been removed by a third party program
Failed to save storage in database
Failed to delete storage from database
Failed to save crypt_check_hash and crypt_check_salt data for password
Failed to save crypt_check data for password
File saved to «%s». Do you want to open file?
Incorrect initial path for file/folder picker: %s
Error with open SAF file/folder picker
Permission is required to access the directory of storage «%s» in the device\'s file system.\nSelect the storage directory in the next window
